events.message: I received my order last week but the item is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund because the product does not match the description provided on the website.
The issue raised by the customer has been categorised under Refund due to their request for money back and dissatisfaction with the product.
An available customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer who reported the issue.

To process your refund quickly, we need the order ID and any supporting documentation showing the mismatch between the product and description.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached photos showing the product I received compared to the description on your website.
Thank you for providing the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should receive the amount within 5-7 business days. Please keep the product until we confirm pickup.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you starting the refund process and letting me know about the timeline.
The refund process is underway and your case has been resolved on our side. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is in order or if you require any further assistance.
I received the refund today. Everything was handled smoothly. Thank you for your help and responsiveness.
The refund case is now formally closed following confirmation from the customer that the refund was received satisfactorily.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to the customer to gather feedback about their experience with the refund process.
